name: Chatwoot
description: Chatwoot is an open-source customer engagement suite, an alternative to Intercom, Zendesk, and Drift. It lets you manage conversations across multiple channels like website live chat, email, WhatsApp, Facebook, and more â€” all from a single inbox.

notes.text: Chatwoot requires 2GB+ RAM and PostgreSQL/Redis services, which are included and configured during the install script.
The initial setup might take a few minutes while dependencies and the application are being installed.
